entries.meaning: A tall pole up which one or more flags may be raised and flown.

verbs.description: flagpole (third-person singular simple present flagpoles, present participle flagpoling, simple past and past participle flagpoled) #** you’re entering Canada from the United States #*** you cannot travel from inside Canada to the port of entry (in other words, you cannot “flagpole”)[...]

entries.meaning: (Canada, rare) Exit a country momentarily and reenter. Usually this is done to satisfy immigration requirements.
